question: Which is the most widely spoken Uralic language in the world?
explanation: Hungarian is a Uralic language spoken in Hungary and parts of several neighbouring countries. It is the official language of Hungary and one of the 24 official languages of the European Union. With 13 million speakers, it is the Uralic family's largest member by the number of speakers. It is among the few non-Indo-European languages to be widely spoken in Europe.
